channel.title: Who do you miss?
channel.description:
A serious discussion, who do you actually miss from the MoparScape forums?
Personally I'd have to say Assassins Creed Fan and Telenim.

item.title: Who do you miss?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I can’t believe Adam banned himself and resigned from his position, I haven’t even seen him on MSN. I suppose he made another one or blocked me but even if he did, I will still miss him as a Moderator.

Read full topic

item.title: Who do you miss?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:109, topic:383629”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=479399.msg3515342#msg3515342 date=1298933841]

And guess who tattled on him for it, as well as casey.?

No one ‘tattled’, it was all said publicly in #mopar.
[/quote]
I personally believe that both of them should deserve another chance, mainly because we’re all still ‘kids’ and we enjoy bragging and whatnot. Although they did scam other players on Runescape, I do not see how that specific act is a violation of the rules. Even if it is, I fully object that rule. Runescape is Runescape. These forums are forums. What we do on each should not be interrelated. It isn’t justifiable to punish others for what they’ve done elsewhere. If a member were to murder another human outside of these forums and not get caught, but talk about it in the IRC, would that member be banned? If so, then I do not understand the reasoning behind that. I’m not implying that these two members shouldn’t have been banned; I’m only requesting that they receive a second chance. That is all. Please take this post into consideration…[/quote]
I agree with jc.

Read full topic

@Alec I know, I was alluding.

item.title: Who do you miss?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:107, topic:383629”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=479399.msg3515301#msg3515301 date=1298931386]
And guess who tattled on him for it, as well as casey.?
[/quote]

No one ‘tattled’, it was all said publicly in #mopar.[/quote]
I personally believe that both of them should deserve another chance, mainly because we’re all still ‘kids’ and we enjoy bragging and whatnot. Although they did scam other players on Runescape, I do not see how that specific act is a violation of the rules. Even if it is, I fully object that rule. Runescape is Runescape. These forums are forums. What we do on each should not be interrelated. It isn’t justifiable to punish others for what they’ve done elsewhere. If a member were to murder another human outside of these forums and not get caught, but talk about it in the IRC, would that member be banned? If so, then I do not understand the reasoning behind that. I’m not implying that these two members shouldn’t have been banned; I’m only requesting that they receive a second chance. That is all. Please take this post into consideration…

Read full topic

No one ‘tattled’, it was all said publicly in #mopar.[/quote]

item.title: Who do you miss?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:101, topic:383629”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=479399.msg3514257#msg3514257 date=1298830921]

Scape-JAVA didnt get banned. He banned himself.

He said MSCP meant nothing to him anymore, and he doesn’t want to moderate adolescent teenagers anymore

^ (Quote from: TOMSCAPE BETA; via MSN) ^

I’m pretty sure suicide is illegal

Nah but I miss scape… he was a good mod. Short lived, but a good mod
[/quote]
Who said anything about suicide? :P[/quote]

Banning yourself is like killing yourself. I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Who do you miss?
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

I’m not sure if SWAT is gone or isn’t active anymore, but if hes gone I miss him. He got me into programming about 3-4 years ago.
Just looking at what he done made me want to do the same.

Read full topic
